snippet: Mason, the Auburn tailback who helped power the Tigers into the Bowl Championship Series title game, is skipping his senior season to enter the N.F.L. draft.
abstract: Auburn tailback Tre Mason is skipping his senior season to enter the NFL draft, where he is projected as likely midround draft pick; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mason, the Auburn tailback who helped power the Tigers into the Bowl Championship Series title game, is skipping his senior season to enter the N.F.L. draft.

headline.main: Auburn’s Tre Mason to Enter N.F.L. Draft
headline.print_headline: Auburn’s Mason to Enter N.F.L. Draft
